GlobalLookupField.Title: New Product & Process Development
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
1. New Product Development
  2. New Process Development
  3. New base formula, new product form, or new processing equipment

GlobalLookupField.Title: Line Extension
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
1. Existing base formula with either new shape,  color, or flavor
  2. Pack type not currently a part of the current portfolio for that semi or brand

GlobalLookupField.Title: Downweight/Transitions
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
1. Change in net weight
  2. Case pack quantity change
  3. Change pallet quantity

GlobalLookupField.Title: Graphic Changes
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
1. Limited or no change to existing product specs and no change to FG#
  2. Includes Graphics Change, Network Move, Component transition

GlobalLookupField.Title: Simple Network Move
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
1. A move required between plants that are both in the same country
  2. NO CHANGES are needed in packaging, graphics

GlobalLookupField.Title: New Pack Type
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
• Updated Packaging on existing product
  • 9 months to 2 years

GlobalLookupField.Title: Renovation & Quality Improvement
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
1. Renovation and Quality Improvement
  2. Renovation and Quality Improvement
